website_summaries.verdict: The best way to create plumper lips that stay hydrated all day long.
pros: You’ll see noticeably plumper lips within two minutes and the effects last for hours
Lip balm glides on smoothly and leaves lips feeling hydrated
Available in three shades, including a translucent option that wears well under lipstick
cons: Stinging sensation, while subtle, does last for ten or more minutes

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure that this is a counterfeit product. The product had no sting. It did absolutely nothing as far as plumping and the packaging was completely absent. I just got a tube of lipstick in a plastic baggy that looked like it was spray painted. For 38$. I was ripped off
customer_reviews.author: Sarah_grace

customer_reviews.title: If you are a makeup minimalist like me and want more of a natural/effortless look
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the majority of the reviewers. This product is ultra moisturizing and you definitely do get a tingly sensation. Although I didn't notice much of a visible plumping effect, I think because of the mere hydration factor, it gives the impression of fuller, sexier lips. If you are a makeup minimalist like me and want more of a natural/effortless look, this is a great product. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the lasting effect of this product. However I do feel that it was a high price point for a product that was utilized quickly. I will most likely look for a more cost efficient product that has similar results.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the colors boysenberry, cherry, watermelon, pink mango and nude honey on the JM site. However, they are completely out of the clear. Most of the colored balms seems too light or are off for my complexion (Fenty #330) The nude honey is not flattering on me at all, it's too flat. The others I can make work by mixing with either lipstick or gloss to warm up/deepen the colors. I like the clear, because I don't have to worry about any color not matching my complexion. Otherwise, I like the balms, they're light, not sticky, smell nice and do have a slight stinging sensation that isn't painful.
customer_reviews.author: MioRioZio

customer_reviews.title: No stinging at all
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought josies lip stinging butter before and it always stung (which I like) but something has changed. I bought a colored one off of her website and that one didn’t sting either. Was able to return this one that I bought on Amazon. Did read the reviews before buying and saw that some people said the stinging was too much and some said felt nothing so I gave it a try. Oh well
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I’m hooked on this !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip butter , makes my lips feel very hydrated and shiny .
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Lip moisture and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: This color is wonderful. Moisture is perfect. Just ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: hillary westwick

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this brand and I love it! I got the "work it" vanilla/clear. The product looks like a very expensive brand of lipstick. It makes my lips feel smooth and even though it does sting, it's not overwhelming. Stings just enough to let you know it's working!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought the lipstick would be smooth and creamy on my lips. It was not. Kind of dry as a matter of fact. Very disappointed with the product. I will go back to my Balm by L'Oreal. Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann M. Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Great lip moisturize
customer_reviews.text: Great product - price is less then QVC or Josie Maran web site. Works well, hydrates, and feels great on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t plump at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very expensive lip balm that claims to plump lips. It does not do that at all. I saw no difference whatsoever while using it. I did however feel a tingling or stinging sensation on my lips after application. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my lips moist and plump
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it has just enough color to be seen, but not so much that it looks overdone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Disappointed. Thick cream. Feel no sting. Should have purchased directly from Maran and paid more. This is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it tasted love the color
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t go on smooth it’s a little hard at the beginning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Make Your Lips Bigger
customer_reviews.text: I got Work It Vanilla and the flavor was fine and it is moisturizing but this chapstick isn't going to make your lips any bigger like some of the reviews have said. Its just plain chapstick honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Everything It Says!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how soft my lips felt after using it and the color lasts for hours. Will order again. I Love everything Josie Maran.
customer_reviews.author: jlove

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Has a Pleasant Smell, Goes on nicely, color is nice & lasting, Slightly tingling, not any Plumpling tho:-(
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: stays on pretty much all day
customer_reviews.text: Creamy perfect color and better than most lip colors on the market
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a lip plumper. Just an ordinary lipstick. The matte texture is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mo. D.

customer_reviews.title: It's lip balm, no lip plumping effect at all.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not do anything more than moisturize my lips like any average lip balm on the market. There was no change in the "plumpness" of my lips. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Harbour Staack

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Stays on well. Nice soft, smooth feel. Pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was used when I opened package
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I have used in the past. What I did not like is receiving the lipstick today upon opening the package it was USED! I will probably not order these types of products from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lipstick!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick. Can I have one in every color. Stays on long and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Danley

customer_reviews.title: You will Love this lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. Have been using g it for years was happy to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: William Jay Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Looks Natural
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin lips and this adds just a hint of puffiness. Looks very natural. Love all JM products.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Newton

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Lipstick goes on smooth ang stays longer than any lipstick I’ve ever tried. Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Keller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: Had high anticipation due to the reviews. However, did not see any significant effect. Had to return it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja87

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting plumper
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color. Love the slight tingle. Lips do look plumper when layered. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive chapstick... Very Nice as a balm, absolutely no plumping at all. . very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: April C

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot about Josie Maran lip butter and pleased with product. True flattering soft lasting color. Factory packaging and add’l shipping wrap
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Very good for your lips, non drying
customer_reviews.text: Live this lipstick. Does not dry out your lips in all weather
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, product was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and product arrived in perfect condition. So happy I'm able to reorder!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It's dry ~ much like rubbing a candle on your lips. Terrible look & feel. :(
customer_reviews.author: Melody Stege Wright

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Nourishes and goes on like a balm and not a sticky gloss. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product stings your tongue.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the product it stinged my tongue after application on my lips. I am returning product.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting and damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick came damaged and disgusting and had some white puss-like substance on the side. Disgusting. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Zeljana

customer_reviews.title: No tingling feeling
customer_reviews.text: The peach color is not what I thought it would be and there was no stinging or tingling feeling. It does stay on well!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great color though not moisturizing, nor does it stay on long.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Have used this before. Nice nude color and good for your lips.
customer_reviews.author: yankee clipper

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick! It goes on smooth and the grapefruit scent is lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite Josie lipstick! Plumps, moisturizes, and the color is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bertone

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty convinced this is a counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty convinced this is a counterfeit product. I am a huge Josie Maran fan and this product actually burns. I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I didn't get any sting but each time after that I feel it and it is just enough sting so I can tolerate it, doesn't have any weird taste or smell and the product stays on your lips for a long time. you. don't have to constantly re-apply! I will defiantly purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Kovach

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give less then 1 star. Product arrived and was bumpy all over. Bumps are not moisture droplets, but the actual product bumping up. Strong clay/waxy smell. Not grapefruit like other reviews describe. Not happy with the product considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Alldredge

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This isn't great but just ok. My e.l.f. lip plumping gloss that costs $6 is much better. I've used this to put under lip stick for about 2 weeks now and I may return it it's just way overhyped.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Helps Lipstick Stay on Longer Too
customer_reviews.text: I use this product and found it cheaper on Amazon that at Sephora. In addition to plumping my thin lips, it helps my lipstick stay on longer. I put it under and over my lipstick or alone. I do feel a tingling sensation, but that is how it plumps your lips. I use it in both Grapefruit and Vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Plotsky

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: The texture was like a high-end lipstick, but it had more staying power than I expected of such a soft product. I love the color. I was looking for a strong, stinging plump. I'd say this was between a medium and high strength plump. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and plumping
customer_reviews.text: It has a little texture so it exfoliates lips too. I wear it daily under lip color. I love it! Very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: SSSNES

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed Don’t like taste and didn’t see any change in lips
customer_reviews.author: pauline brown

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing!!!
customer_reviews.text: My second time buying! Keeps lips soft and I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this lippy! The color is great, the sting is not annoying, and the moisture barrier is there even after the color wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the product but did not like the smell
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but did not like the smell. Was looking for more of an unscented product. This smelled like vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like this lip butter because it is a great moisturizer but No plumping .
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing but sting
customer_reviews.text: Stings lips, feels like I have dry cracked lips. Does NOT plump,. I repeat.. waste of money! I'm gonna call for refund.
customer_reviews.author: jmreviews

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Love live love this lipstick!! Moisture and plumping.. amazing!!! and grapefruit taste!! This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: nicole okun

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t experience any lip plumping
customer_reviews.text: OK. I didn’t notice any plumping! The grapefruit color is not a pretty shade.
customer_reviews.author: Please rescue cats

customer_reviews.title: Great lip plumper great colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous color and give just the right fullness, beautiful sheer color.
customer_reviews.author: emktrx

product_meta.title: Josie Maran Argan Lip Sting Plumping Butter - Nourish and Enhance Lips With a Voluptuous Pout (4.5g/0.16oz, Work It - Clear)
product_meta.description: Color:Work It (clear)An argan- and honey-infused lip butter to visibly plump lips. Infused with 100 percent pure argan oil, this lip butter nourishes, conditions, soothes, and plumps lips. A proprietary long-term complex visibly plumps lips and increases circulation for a voluptuous, juicy look, while soothing manuka honey and moringa butter hydrate and enhance barrier recovery.
feature_bullets: The subtle sting and proprietary lip-plumping complex of Josie Maran Lip Sting visibly enhances lips for a voluptuous, juicy pout.
Infused with 100% Pure Argan Oil, this plumping lip butter nourishes, conditions, soothes, and volumizes lips.
A perfect lipstick that stays, it doesn’t bleed, and it won’t dry your lips out while still providing a color that you can build on.

Josie Maran believes in cosmetics with a conscience. That is why Lip Sting is cruelty free, vegan, paraben free, sulfate free, gluten free, phthalate free, synthetic fragrance free, mineral oil free, formaldehyde free, and peg free.
Combining 100% Pure Argan Oil, soothing manuka honey, and moringa butter allows Lip Sting to hydrate for smoother and fuller-looking lips.
